python:
from event_manager import *
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
import time
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20
from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
import sys
import uselect
from aiot_rgbled import RGBLed

event_manager.reset()

def on_event_timer_callback_b_F_b_f_n():
  global cmd, color, power, temp, mess, humi, partition, function_name, start, argument, end, word
  updata_temp_humi()

event_manager.add_timer_event(20000, on_event_timer_callback_b_F_b_f_n)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def process_data(cmd):
  global color, power, temp, mess, humi, partition, function_name, start, argument, end, word, aiot_dht20, tiny_rgb, aiot_lcd1602
  print(cmd, end =' ')
  partition = cmd.find(':') + 1
  function_name = cmd[ : int(partition - 1)]
  argument = cmd[int((partition + 1) - 1) : ]
  if function_name == 'set_led':
    set_rgp_led(argument)
  if function_name == 'set_fan':
    set_fan(argument)

aiot_dht20 = DHT20(SoftI2C(scl=Pin(22), sda=Pin(21)))

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

# Mô tả hàm này...
def updata_temp_humi():
  global cmd, color, power, temp, mess, humi, partition, function_name, start, argument, end, word, aiot_dht20, tiny_rgb, aiot_lcd1602
  temp = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  humi = aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('Temp : ' + str(temp)))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('Humi : ' + str(humi)))
  print((''.join([str(x) for x in ['!', 'TEMP:', temp, '#']])), end =' ')
  print((''.join([str(x2) for x2 in ['!', 'HUMI:', humi, '#']])), end =' ')

def read_terminal_input():
  spoll=uselect.poll()        # Set up an input polling object.
  spoll.register(sys.stdin, uselect.POLLIN)    # Register polling object.

  input = ''
  if spoll.poll(0):
    input = sys.stdin.read(1)

    while spoll.poll(0):
      input = input + sys.stdin.read(1)

  spoll.unregister(sys.stdin)
  return input

def on_event_timer_callback_H_d_v_u_F():
  global cmd, color, power, temp, mess, humi, partition, function_name, start, argument, end, word
  mess = read_terminal_input()
  while not not len(mess):
    start = mess.find('!') + 1
    end = mess.find('#') + 1
    word = mess[int((start + 1) - 1) : int(end - 1)]
    process_data(word)
    if end == len(mess):
      mess = ''
    else:
      mess = mess[int((end + 1) - 1) : ]

event_manager.add_timer_event(300, on_event_timer_callback_H_d_v_u_F)

tiny_rgb = RGBLed(pin2.pin, 4)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def set_rgp_led(color):
  global cmd, power, temp, mess, humi, partition, function_name, start, argument, end, word, aiot_dht20, tiny_rgb, aiot_lcd1602
  if color == '0':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))
  if color == '1':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ff0000'))
  if color == '2':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#00ff00'))
  if color == '3':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#0000ff'))
  if color == '4':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffa500'))

# Mô tả hàm này...
def set_fan(power):
  global cmd, color, temp, mess, humi, partition, function_name, start, argument, end, word, aiot_dht20, tiny_rgb, aiot_lcd1602
  pin0.write_analog(round(translate((int(power)), 0, 100, 0, 1023)))

if True:
  display.show(Image.HEART_SMALL)

while True:
  event_manager.run()
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
